trans-unit.source: Topic Description
trans-unit.target: Topic Description

trans-unit.source: The topic description is an XML <languageKeyword>AtomPub</languageKeyword> document that defines the desired semantics for a topic.
trans-unit.target: The topic description is an XML <languageKeyword>AtomPub</languageKeyword> document that defines the desired semantics for a topic.

trans-unit.source: The topic description contains the following properties.
trans-unit.target: The topic description contains the following properties.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> the <externalLink><linkText>TopicDescription Properties</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription_properties.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> topic.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> the <externalLink><linkText>TopicDescription Properties</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription_properties.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> topic.

trans-unit.source: Topic Description Properties
trans-unit.target: Topic Description Properties

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>MaxSizeInMegaBytes</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription.maxsizeinmegabytes.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>Number</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>MaxSizeInMegaBytes</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription.maxsizeinmegabytes.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>Number</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum topic size in megabytes.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum topic size in megabytes.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to enqueue a message that causes the topic to exceed this value will fail.
trans-unit.target: Any attempt to enqueue a message that causes the topic to exceed this value will fail.

trans-unit.source: All messages that are stored in the topic or any of its subscriptions count towards this value.
trans-unit.target: All messages that are stored in the topic or any of its subscriptions count towards this value.

trans-unit.source: Multiple copies of a message that reside in one or more subscriptions count as a single messages.
trans-unit.target: Multiple copies of a message that reside in one or more subscriptions count as a single messages.

trans-unit.source: For example, if message <embeddedLabel>m</embeddedLabel> exists once in subscription <embeddedLabel>s1</embeddedLabel> and twice in subscription <embeddedLabel>s2</embeddedLabel>, then <embeddedLabel>m</embeddedLabel> is counted as a single message.
trans-unit.target: For example, if message <embeddedLabel>m</embeddedLabel> exists once in subscription <embeddedLabel>s1</embeddedLabel> and twice in subscription <embeddedLabel>s2</embeddedLabel>, then <embeddedLabel>m</embeddedLabel> is counted as a single message.

trans-unit.source: You can only set this parameter when you create the topic, using the following values:
trans-unit.target: You can only set this parameter when you create the topic, using the following values:

trans-unit.source: Range: 1 – 5*1024 MB
trans-unit.target: Range: 1 – 5*1024 MB

trans-unit.source: Default: 1*1024
trans-unit.target: Default: 1*1024

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>SizeinBytes</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription.sizeinbytes.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>Number</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>SizeinBytes</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription.sizeinbytes.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>Number</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Reflects the actual bytes of messages in the topic that count toward the topic quota.
trans-unit.target: Reflects the actual bytes of messages in the topic that count toward the topic quota.

trans-unit.source: (read-only)
trans-unit.target: (read-only)

trans-unit.source: Range: 0 –<embeddedLabel>MaxTopicSizeinMegaBytes</embeddedLabel>
trans-unit.target: Range: 0 –<embeddedLabel>MaxTopicSizeinMegaBytes</embeddedLabel>

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>DefaultMessageTimeToLive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription.defaultmessagetimetolive.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>XML datetime</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>DefaultMessageTimeToLive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription.defaultmessagetimetolive.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>XML datetime</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Determines how long a message lives in the associated subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Determines how long a message lives in the associated subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions inherit the TTL from the topic unless they are created explicitly with a smaller TTL.
trans-unit.target: Subscriptions inherit the TTL from the topic unless they are created explicitly with a smaller TTL.

trans-unit.source: Based on whether dead-lettering is enabled, a message whose TTL has expired will either be moved to the subscription’s associated DeadLtterQueue or will be permanently deleted.
trans-unit.target: Based on whether dead-lettering is enabled, a message whose TTL has expired will either be moved to the subscription’s associated DeadLtterQueue or will be permanently deleted.

trans-unit.source: You can set the following values when you create the topic:
trans-unit.target: You can set the following values when you create the topic:

trans-unit.source: Range: 1 second –<languageKeyword>TimeSpan.MaxValue</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Range: 1 second –<languageKeyword>TimeSpan.MaxValue</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: Default: <languageKeyword>TimeSpan.MaxValue</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Default: <languageKeyword>TimeSpan.MaxValue</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>RequiresDuplicateDetection</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription.requiresduplicatedetection.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>True, False</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>RequiresDuplicateDetection</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.topicdescription.requiresduplicatedetection.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>: <parameterReference>True, False</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the topic detects duplicate messages within the time span specified by the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">P:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.TopicDescription.DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow</codeEntityReference> property.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, the topic detects duplicate messages within the time span specified by the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="false">P:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.TopicDescription.DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow</codeEntityReference> property.

trans-unit.source: Settable only at topic creation time.
trans-unit.target: Settable only at topic creation time.

trans-unit.source: Default: <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>
trans-unit.target: Default: <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>

trans-unit.source: DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow
trans-unit.target: DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time span during which <token>sb2</token> will detect message duplication.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time span during which <token>sb2</token> will detect message duplication.

trans-unit.source: Range: 1 second – 7 days
trans-unit.target: Range: 1 second – 7 days

trans-unit.source: Default: 10 minutes
trans-unit.target: Default: 10 minutes

trans-unit.source: MaximumNumberOfSubscriptions
trans-unit.target: MaximumNumberOfSubscriptions

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of subscriptions that can be associated with the topic.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of subscriptions that can be associated with the topic.

trans-unit.source: Range: 1– 2000
trans-unit.target: Range: 1– 2000

trans-unit.source: Default: 2000 subscriptions
trans-unit.target: Default: 2000 subscriptions

trans-unit.source: EnableBatchedOperations
trans-unit.target: EnableBatchedOperations

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables service side batching behavior when performing operations for the specific queue.
trans-unit.target: Enables or disables service side batching behavior when performing operations for the specific queue.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, <token>sb2</token> collects/batches multiple operations to the back end in order to be more connection efficient.
trans-unit.target: When enabled, <token>sb2</token> collects/batches multiple operations to the back end in order to be more connection efficient.

trans-unit.source: If you want lower operation latency, you can disable this feature.
trans-unit.target: If you want lower operation latency, you can disable this feature.

trans-unit.source: FilteringMessagesBeforePublishing
trans-unit.target: FilteringMessagesBeforePublishing

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether messages should be filtered before publishing.
trans-unit.target: Gets or sets whether messages should be filtered before publishing.

trans-unit.source: IsAnonymousAccessible
trans-unit.target: IsAnonymousAccessible

trans-unit.source: Gets whether anonymous access is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Gets whether anonymous access is allowed.

trans-unit.source: AuthorizationRules
trans-unit.target: AuthorizationRules

trans-unit.source: Gets the authorization rules for the description.
trans-unit.target: Gets the authorization rules for the description.

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: Status

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current status of the topic (enabled or disabled).
trans-unit.target: Gets or sets the current status of the topic (enabled or disabled).

trans-unit.source: When a topic is disabled, that topic cannot send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: When a topic is disabled, that topic cannot send or receive messages.

trans-unit.source: SupportOrdering
trans-unit.target: SupportOrdering

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the topics can be ordered.
trans-unit.target: Gets or sets whether the topics can be ordered.

trans-unit.source: Here are some things you can do with this API
trans-unit.target: Here are some things you can do with this API

trans-unit.target: List all topics under a given path:

trans-unit.target: List all topics updated in the last 5 minutes:

trans-unit.target: List all topics having at least one message:
